productDescription: The Epic New Swift is the complete safety package. Its comes with 6 Airbags standard across all variants and additional safety features to keep the risk of injury to a minimum and safety to the max.

With super-thin bezels, the 16.94cm(6.67) AMOLED display is a visual delight. Watch all your favourite shows, movies and play your favourite games on a deeply vivid and immersive display. Moreover, Redmi Note 13 5G's display has been optimized for improved touch recognition and control, preventing accidental triggers from water.
